name: Knight's Resolve
description:
After finding out upon a cold winter's morning that the Northern Tribes of Frost Trolls are preparing to descend upon the Kingdom of Aegis through the Northern Pass, Sir Galloway the Righteous must repel the endless hordes of invaders until his trusty stead, Stormbolt can deliver his message to the Garrison at Glenwale City in order to mobilize the troops just in time to face the foreboding evil arising from the North...

(Check out the image for more story context)

Controls:

Click on the left/right/top/bottom ends of the screen to launch an arrow in that direction.

Special thanks to Eric Matyas from SoundImage.org for providing those awesome soundtracks!

I also released this game on Google Play(Will be coming to the Apple App Store soon as well!)! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ComwoSolutions.KnightsResolve&hl=en
